name: Alex An Adventure Between the Ages
name_original: Alex An Adventure Between the Ages
description: Alex: An Adventure Between the Ages is an adventure game in which you will meet Alex, who will have to unravel the whole story and end the curse. You are waiting for skirmishes with ghosts, a lot of puzzles, a funny, but no less terrifying storyline, and much, much more. Try to look around more often, because no one knows where the trouble will be: maybe in an abandoned house, maybe on the street at night, or maybe... maybe even in your own house.
